name: Inking Fish
description:
In the deep sea there is little to eat except glowing orbs of food. Eat them in the right order and collect a swarm of small fish trailing behind you!

This is a very small game with only one playable level created in 43 hours by two people at the img.ly Game Jam 2019 in Bochum.

Created by Sabrina Chmielewski and Robert Deppe

Music by Sascha Brink
